name: Mrs.Cat In Mars
description:
In this 2d precision platformer, you have to memorize and face the invisible and visible deadly objects,running, jumping and meowing! Helping Mrs.Cat to explore Mars and collect all energy gems.

Mrs.Cat In Mars is set in cute and deadly fantasy version of Mars. Run, jump and memorize through a stylized, minimalist and treacherous environment.

Featuring:

  • Stylized pixel-art;
  • 50 hand-crafted levels with increasing complexity!;
  • A platformer game with a stunning and polished game feel!;
  • Tight controls - optmized controls for gamepads and keyboards!;
  • Cool soundtrack!;
  • Enjoy the challenge in Mrs.Cat In Mars!;
